name: Lime Box
description:
Read Before Playing !!! <How Game Works?>

You are a sphere shaped cool guy fighting with box shaped enemies for limes.

Whenever you attack the enemies you get limes.

Limes let you use your skills. Your skills:

  • Rewind enemies back in time. ( They also take damage )  *// Requires 10 limes.
  • Heal

Game involves 2 type of enemies:

  • Melee ( using a sword )
  • Ranged ( using a ball )

Get the green box to teleport, blue box to finish.

<Controls>
  • WASD to move
  • R to Rewind
  • Left Click to Attack
  • Right Click to Heal
<A Problem In The Game>

At some places (the higher ones) you cannot look back because of a problem about the camera control. its recommended for you not to go back in those and just move on and try to finish.

<Need Your Feedback!>

To make a better game and to see my mistakes and not to do those mistakes again, I always need your feedback! Your feedback is really valuable and precious!
